Question Text: Payment issued by NORC or UoC
Notes: Repeated measures associated with Round. For display on study manager dashboard indicates whether payment issued
Derivation Notes: If BioFin_UoCPayment_v1r0 equals 1 or HDPaym_PaymIssued_v1r0 equals 1 then SMPaym_JointPaymIssued_v1r0 equals 1 else 0
